content: स्तु {c2c} <ab>U.</ab> (स्तौति-स्तवीति, स्तुते-स्तुवीते; तुष्टाव-तुष्टुवे, अस्तावीत्-अस्तोष्ट, स्तोष्यति-ते, स्तोतुं, स्तुत; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} तुष्टूषति-ते; the स् of स्तु is changed to ष् after a preposition ending in इ or उ) {@--1@} To praise, laud, eulogize, extol, glorify, celebrate; <ls>Bv. 1. 41</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 16</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 92</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 70</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">3.</ls> {@--2@} To celebrate or praise in song, to hymn, worship by hymns.
